doc.title: Peeping Tom and His Telescope
doc.plot: Comic subjects have the call, here is another one. Peeping Tom buys a telescope, through which he peeps at his neighbors and in one of the scenes, he learns that the Spinster to whom he had made love was made up of many parts, leaving little after she had disrobed. By the time she removes her eyebrows, teeth, hair and other fixtures peculiar to the gentler sex, she remains but a shadow of her former self.
